name: Overlord Laharl and his Vassal Etna
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there are no climax in your opponent's waiting room, you may choose a card in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavor_text:
Prince, you're just a big softy!
If that was me, I would've wasted them all.

name: Raspberyl & Sapphire All Ready for Gym
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of climax in your waiting room is four or more, this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character in your hand into your waiting room］".
flavor_text:
Are there really demons that are this cute?
That's too much for me!

name: Angel Trainee Flonne
ability: 【CONT】Give all other characters 《Love》.

【AUTO】 Bond／"Supreme Overlord Laharl" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Supreme Overlord Laharl" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: This is what we call "love".

name: Petty Thief
ability: 【ACT】［(2)］ Choose one of the characters on your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1500 power until end of turn, and this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Howdy! I sure like stealing things!

name: Etna & Flonne
ability: 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 ［Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ （Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.）
flavor_text:
Etna: Hey, have you got flowers for brains?
Flonne: Oh, well I just adore pretty little flowers!

name: Flonne, the Love Maniac
ability: 【CONT】All of your other characters with 《Love》 or "愛" in its card name get +1000 power.
【AUTO】 When a card named "Even a Demon Needs Love" is placed on your climax area, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Don't worry! The power of friendship will lead you to victory!

name: Laharl & Flonne
flavor_text: Laharl: That's right! I'm the Overlord!

name: Samurai Legend
flavor_text: I choose to live by the way of the sword.

name: Seraph Lamington
flavor_text:
Demons certainly have love inside of them.
They just haven't found it yet.

name: Even a Demon Needs Love
ability: 【CONT】All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【POOL】: When this card triggers, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavor_text: If there's love in your life, you just can't help but smile!

name: Vyers, the Dark Adonis Mid-Boss
ability: 【CONT】Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may return this card to your deck. If you do, shuffle your deck.
flavor_text:
Laharl: I don't care what your name is.
I'm calling you "Mid-Boss"!

name: Prince Laharl of the Netherworld
ability: 【AUTO】When this card attacks, if a card named "King of the Earth" is in your climax area, you may choose a card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on top of your opponent's deck.

【AUTO】 Bond／"Etna & Flonne" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Etna & Flonne" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text:
The name's Laharl.
I'm heir to the throne of the Netherworld!

name: Supreme Overlord Laharl
ability: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
【ACT】［Put this card into your memory］ Choose up to two 《Angel》 or 《Demon》 characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand.
flavor_text: What fool dares awaken me, the great Laharl?

name: Etna , the Overlord Assassin
flavor_text: Wow... He's really dead, huh?

name: Elite Red Mage
ability: 【ACT】［(1)］ Choose one of your opponent's level 0 or lower characters on the center stage, and put it into your opponent's waiting room.
flavor_text: Proof! When there's a magic fight on hand, I get to play the starring role!

name: Super Robot Thursday
ability: 【CONT】All of your other characters with 《Hero》 or "主人公" in its card name get +500 power.
【ACT】［(2) 【REST】 this card］ Choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: BEEP BEEP BLIP BEEP. I WILL…FIGHT…BY...YOUR SIDE...UNTIL...THE...VERY END...

name: Captain Gordon, Defender of Earth
flavor_text: You fiend! As the 37th Defender of Earth, I will lay waste to your wicked plans!

name: Demon Girl Etna, the Ultimate Beauty
flavor_text:
Act II: The Rise of Queen Etna
A pretty girl strutting her stuff in the darkness of the Netherworld!

name: Mecha-Jennifer
ability: Deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax in your waiting room. （This damage can be canceled）
flavor_text:
So that did the trick? Is it better now?
Well, it sure feels like it.

name: King of the Earth
ability: 【CONT】All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavor_text: Don't freak out on me! Pretty soon, I'm gonna be king of the Earth!

name: Fuka Kazamatsuri
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your deck is five or less, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +3000 power and +2 soul until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (Your opponent cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavor_text: I love my dream! I can sense a happy ending is just around the corner!!

name: Ｒａｓｐｂｅｒｙｌ & Flonne
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a climax in your opponent's waiting room, and return it to his or her deck. If you do, shuffle your opponent's deck, and this card gets +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Raspberyl: "Badasses like us gotta keep our cool!"

name: “Devil Buster” Adell
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "And trust this!" is in your climax area, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: Blood isn’t the bond that makes a group of people a family. It’s the heart.

name: Prinny X-Terminators' Leader, Fuka
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Prinny》 character, choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 COUNTER@ Backup 1500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: I'm not a Prinny!! I'm Fuka Kazamatsuri!!

name: Mystery Angel, Sicily
ability: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Demon》 or 《Angel》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text:
…...R-Really!?
Are you sure?

name: “Beliefs of a Maiden” Fuka
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When a card named "Prinny Wars" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a level 2 or lower character facing this card, return it to your opponent's deck, and your opponent shuffles his or her deck.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: I only accept dreams that have happy endings, whether they happen at the end or not!!

name: Overlord Mao
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1 soul for each card in your level.

【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card attacks, if a card named "To my lab---!!" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 2 or lower characters, and put that character into his or her stock.
flavor_text: Have you said your prayers, Super Hero? This will be your grave.

name: Asuka Cranekicker
ability: 【CONT】 If your opponent does not have any climax in the waiting room, this card gets +1 soul.
flavor_text: That’s our lady! The most delinquent of them all!

name: “Younger Sister Aura” Sicily
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a climax, choose a character facing this card, and that character gets -1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Big Brother, do you need to go to the bathroom before we leave?

name: Death Emizel
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your opponent's hand is four or less, this card gets +1000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's stock.
flavor_text: As Death, I will reap……your soul.

name: Kyoko Needleworker
ability: 【CONT】 If your opponent does not have any climax in the waiting room, this card gets +2000 power.
flavor_text: That’s our lady! A model delinquent!

name: Childhood Friend Raspberyl
ability: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Overlord Mao" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Overlord Mao" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: But I won’t let go of these hands! That’s the bond between me and you!

name: Fallen Angel Flonne
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Demon》 characters in front of this card get +1 level and +500 power.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose one of your 《Demon》 characters, that character gets +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Sir Laharl, do your best for the things that were stolen from us!

name: Salvatore the Magnificent
ability: 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position on the stage.
flavor_text: I command you! Show me your true strength!

name: Legendary Chief Graduate, Beryl
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of cards in your deck is five or less, return all cards in your waiting room to your deck. If you do, shuffle your deck, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card attacks, if a card named "And have become legend……" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 2 or lower characters, and put that character into his or her stock.
flavor_text: Asuka: "Your perfect attendance shall continue to shine radiantly throughout the history of this school!"

name: Overlord Laharl
ability: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul.
【AUTO】 Encore [(2)] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text:
Haaaahahaha!!
Now I'll get to show up more often!!

name: Netherworld Honor Student, Mao
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into the waiting room from your stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Brave》 character or character with "Protagonist(主人公)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: ……Now, how do I want to cook him? Hahaha……

name: “Big Sis” Fuka
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Clone》 characters, and that character gets +1 level and +500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: You're gonna protect me, right?

name: Pampered Child, Emizel
ability: 【CONT】 If your opponent has a climax on his or her climax area, the character facing this card gets -1 soul.
flavor_text:
Call me Sir Emizel.
The only son of the President, Sir Emizel!!

name: Special Assassination Task Force Leader, Emizel
ability: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. Search your deck for up to X 《Death》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand and shuffle your deck. Choose X cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of climax cards revealed among those cards.
flavor_text: Shut up! I'm not a weakling!!

name: Girl in a Prinny Cap, Fuka
ability: 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] This card gets +1 level and +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Hmhmhm! There you are!

name: Like a Picnic, Sicily
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is four or less, your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power.
【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavor_text: I can bring up to 300 HL's worth of snacks, right?

name: “Overlord's Spot” Sicily
flavor_text:
My name is Sicily.
I'm here to become the Overlord!

name: Middle Schooler Who Fell to Hades, Fuka
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a climax in your opponent's waiting room, and return it to his or her deck. If you do, shuffle your opponent's deck, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: This is war! A war to rid my dream of all demons and make it more fantastical and girly! A battle for freedom and youth!

name: Netherworld President Jr, Emizel
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other characters get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.

【AUTO】 [(2) Put this card into your waiting room] When a card named "Vow of the Phoenix" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Death Emizel" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: I will become a great demon all on my own!!

name: Package from Celestia, Sicily
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your stock] When a card named "Birth of a New Overlord" is put into your waiting room from your climax area, if your opponent does not have any other characters in his or her center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "“Overlord” Sicily" in your waiting room, and put it on this card's previous stage position as 【REST】.
flavor_text: It's time for my secret weapon finisher.

name: Adell & Rozalin
flavor_text: Rozalin: "You love the thrill of battle, don't you?"

name: President Raspberyl
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use "Brainstorm", if a climax is put into the waiting room by that effect, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text:
My manifisto requires everyone to do one good turn daily!
Soon enough, this Netherworld is gonna be filled with delinquents!!

name: “Overlord” Sicily
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Demon》 or 《Angel》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room].
flavor_text: Yes! That means I'm the Overlord now, right?

name: Mao & Raspberyl
flavor_text: Raspberyl: "Mao and I are enemies, and friends! We're not strangers in the least!!"

name: Delinquent Student, Raspberyl
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is less than your opponent's hand, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: Why not forget this evil stuff for now and do a little something good with me?

name: Sexy Demon Wish, Hanako
ability: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Adell isn't alone! Hanako is here for him!

name: Majin Etna
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of climax in your waiting room is four or more, this card gets +1 soul.
flavor_text: Ohh, no no no. That wasn't even a warm-up. That was just to show you how strong and beautiful I am.

name: Geoffrey
ability: 【CONT】 Alarm When this card is the top card of your clock, all of your characters get the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's stock."
flavor_text: Hmhmhm... ... Good thing I thought this might happen―――

name: Battle Maniac, Adell
ability: 【ACT】 COUNTER@ Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text:
I can't let you do that!
Abandoning a friend just isn't my style!

name: Overthrow! God of All Overlords!
ability: Choose up to five cards in your waiting room except climax cards, and return them to your deck. Shuffle your deck afterwards. If you returned five cards, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +5000 power and +2 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Adell: ". . . My goal is to defeat Zenon."

name: Strongest Overlord
ability: Choose a climax in your opponent's waiting room, and return it to your opponent's deck. If you do, shuffle your opponent's deck, choose one of your opponent's level 2 or lower characters, and put it into his or her stock.
flavor_text:
Are you all ready?
We're off to search for Tyrant Overlord Baal!

name: Important… Allies?
ability: Choose a card in your waiting room, and return it to your deck. Shuffle your deck afterwards. Put this card into your memory.
flavor_text: Raspberyl: "Hehehe, then you better remember that stuffiness was friendship."

name: Battle Arena Begins!
ability: COUNTER@ All of your characters get +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Usagi: "Great fighters can expect to be rewarded with fame, and may even test their skill by challenging Overlord Zenon himself."

name: And trust this!
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavor_text: Adell: "I'm gonna say it again. You are not alone."

name: Prinny Wars
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: I'll annihilate you and all of the Prinnies! It'll be total annihilation! For all of you!

name: To my lab---!!
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavor_text: Mao: "You're a rare subject."

name: And have become legend……
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +3 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: ――Raspberyl's accomplishments are told and retold for generations to come――

name: Vow of the Phoenix
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal one damage to your opponent.)
(【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)
flavor_text: I wanna earn the recognition I deserve with my own power.

name: Birth of a New Overlord
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose one of your opponent's characters, and return it to your opponent's hand.)
(【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavor_text: "Over the next few thousand years, Angel Overlord Sicily became a legend who was talked about for all eternity."

name: “Aloof Majin” Etna
ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Prinny》 or have "Etna" in its card name, this card gets +2000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Like I said before, I don't need, nor do I want, an older brother.

name: Unemployed Etna
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Supreme Overlord Girl" is in your climax area, all of your characters get +1000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: Okay, Prince. Are you happy now?

name: Tyrant Etna
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of cards in your deck is five or less, return all cards in your waiting room to your deck. If you do, shuffle your deck, and all of your characters get +2000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: Hmph. Killing all these stupid things was just a waste of time.

name: Evangelist of Love, Flonne
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Demon》 or 《Angel》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1500 power.
flavor_text: I, Flonne, The Fallen Angel of Love, will not allow this angel bullying to stand!

name: Thief Angel, Artina
ability: 【AUTO】 [【REST】 two of your 【STAND】 characters] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."
flavor_text: Of course, I've been praying since the beginning.

name: Archangel, Flonne
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 2 or higher characters in front of this card get +1000 power.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 two of your characters] Search your deck for up to one 《Demon》 or 《Angel》 or 《Love》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text:
It's...LOVE!!!!
Praying will become the power of love!!

name: Cute Little Demon, Etna
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of characters you have with "Assist".

【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, search for up to one 《Demon》 or 《Prinny》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Wasn't that nice of them, Prince? They gave us their tickets.

name: Awakened Angel, Pure Flonne
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of your other 《Demon》 or 《Angel》 characters is three or more, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Demon》 or 《Angel》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text:
On Netherworld soil, where evil looms, an ephemeral flower blooms!
Pure Flonne the Awakened Angel?(黒いハート)

name: Pringer X
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each marker underneath this card.
【CONT】 Great Performance (When your opponent attacks, if this card is in the middle position of your center stage and not 【REVERSE】, your opponent frontal attacks this card instead)
【ACT】 [Put one of your other 《Prinny》 characters from the stage underneath this card as a marker] This card gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Etna: "The Pringer X is created when Prinnies master the art of fighting, lose themselves, and then combine into one!"

name: Big Sis Prinny
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other characters with "Laharl(ラハール)" in its card name get +500 power.
【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power and 《Love》.
flavor_text:
He has suffered enough already……
My silence is how I show my love.

name: Laharl & Etna
ability: 【AUTO】 If the number of climax in your waiting room is four or more, this card gets +2000 power.
flavor_text:
Etna: "Ohh! That's our Prince!
You're so ruthless."

name: Super Alloy Great Flonzor X
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of cards in your deck is five or less, return all cards in your waiting room to your deck. If you do, shuffle your deck, and this card gets +3000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavor_text: Archangel Flonne: "To protect the beautiful blue Earth! It comes from another dimension! The unstoppable power of love and prayers!!"

name: Young Etna
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1 level.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters with "Overlord(魔王)" in its card name, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: I don't have any more food. If you want some more, you'll have to steal some on your own.

name: Angel Trainee Flonne
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get 《Love》.

【AUTO】 Bond/"Supreme Overlord Laharl" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Supreme Overlord Laharl" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: This is love.

name: Ordinary Cleric
ability: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Feel free to call me if you get hurt.

name: Petty Thief
ability: 【ACT】 [(2)] Choose one of your opponent's characters in the center stage, until end of turn, that character gets -1500 power and this character gets +1500 power.
flavor_text: Hello! It's me, your friendly burglar♪

name: Flonne, the Love Maniac
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Love》 characters or characters with "Love(愛)" in its card name get +1000 power.
【AUTO】 When a card named "Even a Demon Needs Love" is placed in your climax area, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Don't worry! The power of friendship will lead you to victory!

name: Supreme Overlord Baal
ability: 【CONT】 If you do not have any other characters, this card gets +10000 power, +2 soul, and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's clock."
flavor_text:
The Lord of Terror, Baal…...
The Legend was true…...

name: Nurse, Altina
ability: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Tyrant, Valvatorez" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Tyrant, Valvatorez" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: If you'd like mine, go ahead.

name: Judge Nemo
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may choose a card in your opponent's clock, and put it into your opponent's waiting room. If you do, put the top card of your opponent's deck into his or her clock.
flavor_text:
I'm not a criminal.
I was born to judge humanity's sins.

name: Nice-Bodied Etna
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose a climax in your opponent's waiting room, return it to your opponent's deck, and your opponent shuffles his or her deck.
flavor_text: I'm not giving in about being Nice-Bodied!!!!

name: Mystery Demon, Xenolith
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When another of your 《Demon》 characters is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: I used to live here with my sister.

name: Player 2, Etna
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Demon》 or 《Prinny》 characters get +500 power.
flavor_text:
Wh-What the hell!?
I look like I'm Player 2!?

name: Samurai Legend
flavor_text: I choose to live by the way of the sword.

name: Trespasser from Celestia, Artina
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your stock is four or more, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: Please wait for me, Lady Archangel. I've almost reached my goal.

name: Unkind Demon, Etna
ability: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +1 level, +4000 power and +1 soul.

【AUTO】 [Put a card named "Siblings' Conversation" face down underneath this card as a marker] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there are no markers underneath this card, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your next stand phase.
flavor_text: But in return, you're going to have to do whatever I say for the rest of my life.

name: Elusive, Artina
ability: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 At the beginning of your encore step, if you have a card named "Demon and Angel Bond" in your climax area, 【REST】 this card, and move it to any position of your stage. (You may choose the current position)
flavor_text: Hmhmhm. Good day, everyone.

name: “Out-of-control Artifact” Xenolith
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other characters.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Dumbfounded Etna
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose two of your 【STAND】 characters, and 【REST】 them.
flavor_text:
*sigh* There she goes again.
Whaddaya wanna do, Prince?

name: Prinny Squad
ability: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck.
【ACT】 [Put a 《Prinny》 character into your waiting room] Choose one of your opponent's characters in the center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Etna: "Come on, Prinny Squad!!"
Etna: "Get your butts out here, NOW!!"

name: Genius Magic Knight
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a climax in your opponent's waiting room, and return it to his or her deck. If you do, shuffle your opponent's deck, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: I will become the sword of everyone from now onwards.

name: Etna & Flonne
ability: 【ACT】 COUNTER@ Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text:
Etna: "Hey, have you got flowers for brains?"
Flonne: "Oh, well I just adore pretty little flowers."

name: Space Detective Guardian Flonne
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Assassin from Celestia" is in your climax area, all of your characters get +1000 power until end of turn.
【ACT】 [【REST】 one of your characters] This card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Let the people's cheers bring you courage!
Trannnnsforrrrrrrmmmmm! Guardian Flonne!!

name: Helplessly Useless Archer
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text:
My hobby is shooting at vital points.
My forte is these awesome curls.
Let's all get curly!

name: Seraph Lamington
flavor_text:
Demons certainly have love inside of them.
They just haven't found it yet.

name: Winged Slayer
ability: Perform the following action until you level up. "Put the top card of your deck into your clock."
All of your opponent's characters get -3000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: A devastating strike from the sky

name: They are all mine
ability: Choose a climax in your opponent's waiting room, and return it to his or her deck. If you do, shuffle your opponent's deck, and put two cards from the top of your deck into your stock.
flavor_text: I'll kill anyone who would steal my sweets!!

name: Conspiracy of the School Board
ability: Choose two of your characters, and 【REST】 them. If you 【REST】 two characters, all of your characters get +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Who are you!? I was about to begin a re-education program.

name: Bow Revival!
ability: COUNTER@ Choose up to five cards in your waiting room except climax cards, and return them to your deck. Shuffle your deck afterwards. If you returned five cards, choose one of your opponent's characters in the center stage, and that character gets -1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Finally… I have finally returned!

name: Supreme Overlord Girl
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: The world is mine!!

name: Siblings' Conversation
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: ……Stupid Big Brother.

name: Even a Demon Needs Love
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【POOL】: When this card triggers, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavor_text: If there's love in your life, you just can't help but smile.

name: Assassin from Celestia
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavor_text: Ｎｉｃｅ　ｔｏ　ｍｅｅｔ　ｙｏｕ．　Ｉ’ｍ　ａｎ　ａｓｓａｓｓｉｎ~

name: Demon and Angel Bond
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavor_text: Valvatorez: "Woman…… why did you protect me?"

name: Most Evil Overlord, Laharl
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Overlord Passing Through" is in your climax area, until end of turn, this card gets +3000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may deal one damage to your opponent." (This damage may be canceled)
【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]
flavor_text: I'll agree to join you as long as I get three meals a day.!

name: Laharl & Mao
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a climax in your opponent's waiting room, and return it to his or her deck. If you do, shuffle your opponent's deck, and this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavor_text:
Laharl: "Whoever loses is the real legendary Overlord! Got it !?"
Mao: "Bring it!"

name: “Power of Sardines” Valvatorez
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of your other characters is one or less, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】 from your opponent character's 【AUTO】 effect."
flavor_text: How magical─── Are these insignificant creatures, known as sardines!!!

name: Werewolf Butler, Fenrich
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of your other characters is one or less, all of your other characters get +1500 power.
flavor_text: My Lord……! Do not be so rash in making so many futile promises!

name: Reborn Krichevskoy
ability: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Garungun: "He is the newest and evilest Overlord in New Netherworld history, New King Krichevskoy!"

name: Dominating Presence of Netherworld, Laharl
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Demon》 or 《Angel》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.
flavor_text: Haaahahahaha!!

name: Tyrant, Valvatorez
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Demon》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 2 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavor_text: My pride will not allow me to indulge in the blood of a human who possesses no fear of demons.

name: Likes Superhero Shows, Flonne
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top three cards of all players' decks into the waiting room.

【ACT】 COUNTER@ Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Look at that crowd of demons.

name: Supreme Overlord Laharl
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
【ACT】 [Put this card into your memory] Choose up to two 《Angel》 or 《Demon》 characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand.
flavor_text: ……What fool dares awaken me, the great Laharl?

name: Former Angel Flonne
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Demon》 characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".

【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, if the number of climax in your waiting room is four or more, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Attack! Attack!! Attack!!!

name: “Dark Adonis”Mid-Boss
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of cards in your deck is five or less, return all cards in your waiting room to your deck. If you do, shuffle your deck, and you may deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may return this card to your deck. If you do, shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Mid-Boss: "But, do not foolishly think that I am an ordinary mid-boss." Etna: "Hey! You just admitted that you're a mid-boss."

name: Caretaker of Prinnies, Fenrich
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Prinny》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Blood》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: ……We must plan accordingly.

name: Trainer of Prinnies, Valvatorez
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Prinny》 characters get +500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavor_text: What a splendid idea! I shall show them! What a fighting Prinny Instructor can do!!

name: Self-centered Overlord, Laharl
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your 【STAND】 characters, and 【REST】 it.
flavor_text: I'll destroy your Majin, as well．

name: Absolute Loyalty, Fenrich
ability: 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, if a card named "Vow of the Moon" is in your climax area, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: The moon is the symbol of my loyalty to my Lord.

name: Sharp Criticism, Etna
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Demon》 or 《Prinny》 characters you have.
flavor_text: Prince, this place has a lot of expensive looking stuff. You want us to take it all, right?

name: Rebel Against God, Valvatorez
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of your other 《Demon》 or 《Angel》 or 《Prinny》 characters is three or more, this card gets +1000 power.
【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Ties of "Camaraderie"" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a level 3 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it into his or her waiting room.
flavor_text: ……Then, shall we head out? To rebel against God!

name: Master Big Star
ability: 【AUTO】 When another of your characters becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: My, my. What a troublesome brat.

name: Fake Laharl
ability: 【CONT】 If you have a card named "Prince Laharl of the Netherworld" in your waiting room, this card gets +2000 power.
flavor_text: Etna: "There! Perfect! From now on you're Prince Laharl"

name: Vyers, the Dark Adonis Mid-Boss
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may return this card to your deck. If you do, shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Laharl: "I don't care what your name is. I'm calling you 'Mid-Boss'."

name: Prince Laharl of the Netherworld
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "King of the Earth" is in your climax area, you may choose a card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on the top of his or her deck.

【AUTO】 Bond/"Etna & Flonne" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Etna & Flonne" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text:
The name's Laharl.
I'm heir to the throne of the Netherworld!

name: Defender of Earth, Kurtis
ability: 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose up to two of your opponent's level 1 or lower characters in the center stage, and put them into his or her waiting room.
flavor_text:
Don't laugh!!
It's not like I had a choice!!

name: Overlord Laharl and his Vassal Etna
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there are no climax in your opponent's waiting room, you may choose a card in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavor_text:
Prince, you're just a big softy!
If that was me, I would've wasted them all.

name: “Busty” Girl Laharl
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one level 3 or higher character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Who cares about that!？ I became a damned woman for Overlord's sake!

name: “Overlord's Dignity” Laharl
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1 level and +1500 power for each marker underneath this card.
【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose a 《Demon》 character in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.
flavor_text:
I won't lose this battle.
I'll put everything I have into destroying you!

name: “Sadistic” Etna
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the number of cards in your opponent's clock is zero, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Bond/"Son of the Previous Overlord, Laharl" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Son of the Previous Overlord, Laharl" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: Prince, this guy's really getting on my nerves. Let's kill him already.

name: My Lord's Advisor, Fenrich
ability: 【AUTO】 When another of your 《Demon》 characters becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: His undemonlike "Undoubting Heart" is also one of Lord Valvatorez's formidable powers……

name: New Overlord, Laharl
flavor_text: Don't hold back. Take everything!

name: Demon Girl Etna, the Ultimate Beauty
flavor_text:
Act II: "The Rise of Queen Etna"
A pretty girl strutting her stuff in the darkness of the Netherworld!

name: Demon Awaiting Instructions, Barbara
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use "Backup", this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Did you call for me!

name: “Strongest In the World” Etna
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent does not have any climax in the waiting room, you may choose a card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on the top of his or her deck.
flavor_text:
You owe me one!
No, let's make that two…!

name: Elite Red Mage
ability: 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose one of your opponent's level 0 or lower characters in the center stage, and put it into his or her waiting room.
flavor_text: When there's a magic fight on hand, I get to play the starring role!

name: Super Robot Thursday
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Brave》 characters or characters with "Protagonist(主人公)" in its card name get +500 power.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: BEEP BEEP BLIP BEEP. I WILL…FIGHT…BY…YOUR SIDE…UNTIL…THE…VERY END…

name: Captain Gordon, Defender of Earth
flavor_text: You fiend! As the 37th Defender of Earth, I will lay waste to your wicked plans!

name: Jennifer, Defender of Earth's Assistant
ability: 【CONT】 Alarm When this card is the top card of your clock, all of your 《Brave》 characters or characters with "Protagonist(主人公)" in its card name get +1000 power
flavor_text: Laharl: "Keep your sexy body away from me!!"

name: Dissection Experiment
ability: Choose up to five cards in your waiting room except climax cards, and return them to your deck. Shuffle your deck afterwards. If you returned five cards, choose one of your opponent's level 1 or lower characters, and put that character into his or her waiting room.
flavor_text:
"Sweat!"
"Roger-!"

name: The Dark Assembly
ability: Brainstorm Reveal three cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose a level 2 or lower character in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavor_text: Give up / Persuade by force

name: Back Together
ability: Choose a climax in your opponent's waiting room, and return it to his or her deck. If you do, shuffle your opponent's deck, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Flonne: "So…… I get credit for getting them back togther～! ……Right?"

name: Coming Up Next
ability: Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
Put the top card of your opponent's deck into your opponent's waiting room, choose a card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on the top of his or her deck.
Choose one of your characters with "Etna" in its card name, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Next time on "Demon Gal Etna Dimension 2" Episode 2: "The Birth of Overlord Etna". A new history begins now!

name: King of the Earth
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavor_text: Don't freak out on me! Pretty soon, I'm gonna be king of the Earth.

name: Overlord Passing Through
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Etna: "You know, if things go well, we can just kill these kids and take over this game, Prince."

name: Vow of the Moon
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.

name: Aspiring Final Boss, Desco
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Clone》 or 《Death》 characters get +500 power.
【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, draw up to one card.
flavor_text: Of course! Big Sis!

name: “Final Weapon Girl ＤＥＳＣＯ”
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the level of the character facing this card.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your 【STAND】 characters, and 【REST】 it.
flavor_text: I am…… She who sunk the world into blazing chaos, the Final Weapon, DESCO!!!

name: Sapphire Rhodonite
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".
【ACT】 [Put a 《Demon》 character from your hand into your waiting room] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Ahh! I'm late, I'm late!
First day of school and I am so late!

name: Final Boss Training, Desco
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Final Weapon Appears" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's cost 0 or lower characters, and put it on the bottom of his or her deck.

【AUTO】 Change [(2) Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is 【REST】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "“Final Weapon Girl ＤＥＳＣＯ”" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: Desco promises to follow you until she is ready to become a magnificent final boss!

name: “Ding-Dong-Ditches” Axel
ability: 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Return all cards in your opponent's waiting room to his or her deck. Shuffle your opponent's deck afterwards.
flavor_text: You'll learn to fear Dark Heores when you suffer so many ding-dong-ditches and prank phone calls, you'll never be able to sleep!

name: 63nd Netherworld President,Axel
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card on the bottom of your deck. 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your 《Demon》 characters] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Now, prepare to be enraptured by my voice! And my song!!

name: Fancy Dreamy, Desco
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use "Brainstorm", if a climax is put into the waiting room by that effect, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: ……Will Desco be able to pull off three transformations and bribe the hero by offering them half of the world?

name: Raspberyl & Sapphire
ability: 【CONT】 If your opponent has a 500 power or lower character, this card gets +1500 power.
flavor_text: Ohhh! Aren't you a cutesy little demon!?

name: Almaz Von Almandine Adamant
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one card named "Hero, Almaz", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

【AUTO】 Bond/"Killing Machine, Sapphire" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Killing Machine, Sapphire" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: Now's the time to squeeze out every bit of courage! Protect the Princess with my life!

name: Secretive Teacher, Mr. Champloo
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a climax in your opponent's waiting room, and return it to his or her deck. If you do, shuffle your opponent's deck, and this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw a card."
flavor_text: A strong, intense heart is the only spice that can sway your ingredients' souls!

name: Sheltered Lady, Rozalin
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
【ACT】 [Draw a card] End your main phase and proceed to the end phase.
flavor_text: ...But, what happens when you select "End Turn"?

name: Obstinate Rozalin
ability: 【CONT】 During you opponent's turn, all of your other 《Demon》 characters get +1000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent does not have any climax in the waiting room, draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavor_text:
Fighting is for the lower classes!
It is our duty as nobles to use those fights to improve our kingdom and subjects!

name: Girl Ninja, Yukimaru
ability: 【ACT】 COUNTER@ Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: From now on, you shall have my blade. I will fight with my body and soul for you, zam!

name: Unusual Frog, Tink
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of climax in your waiting room is four or more, this card gets +2000 power.
【ACT】 [(3) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose one of your opponent's level 2 or lower characters in the center stage, and put it on the bottom of his or her deck.
flavor_text: Eh...? What was I doing...?

name: Rozalin & Sapphire
ability: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: How can a noble better justify squandering time than with the pursuit of knowledge?

name: Killing Machine, Sapphire
ability: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Almaz(アルマース)" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power.

【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "Newlywed Queen" is in your climax area, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Kill or be killed, right?

name: Overlord's Daughter, Rozalin
ability: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Overlord Summon" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw up to three cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavor_text: S-Silence! I am the daughter of the legendary Overlord Zenon!

name: Master of the Forbidden Chamber, Desco
ability: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: It's not a lie!! Desco is a final boss!!

name: Hades' Warden, Axel
flavor_text: This is Axelworld!!

name: “Perfect Version” DES X
ability: 【CONT】 If your opponent is level 3 or higher, this card gets +500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavor_text: I am the most powerful true final boss. Lady DES X!!

name: Robust Princess, Sapphire
flavor_text: Hehehe, just because I'm a princess doesn't mean I'm very ladylike.

name: Rozalin's Servant, Taro
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1 level and +1500 power for each marker underneath this card.
【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck underneath this card as a marker.
flavor_text:
Thank you for rescuing me, Princess.
I pledge my life to serve you.

name: Hero, Almaz
ability: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Overlord Almaz" is in your climax area, draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavor_text: I, Almaz von Almandine Adamant shall even die for the princess!! ...Though I'd prefer to live!!

name: Dark Hero, Axel
ability: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text:
Just watch me!!
The Dark Hero is about to make his grand return!!

name: Super Hero, Aurum
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of cards in your deck is five or less, return all cards in your waiting room to your deck. If you do, search your deck for up to one character with "Overlord(魔王)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: I will defeat you...strongest Overlord! Then I shall forever be a hero!

name: Home Economics Teacher, Mr. Champloo
ability: 【AUTO】 During your opponent's turn, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw a card.
flavor_text:
Follow the path of taste!
Young one, go forth on high heat!

name: Cell Phone
ability: Search your deck for up to two 《Teacher》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Choose two cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room.
flavor_text: …Please, help…

name: Broadcast Incident
ability: Choose a climax in your opponent's waiting room, and return it to his or her deck. If you do, shuffle your opponent's deck, draw up to three cards, choose two cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Please wait for a moment.

name: Pudding Mountain
ability: Choose up to five cards in your waiting room except climax cards, and return them to your deck. Shuffle your deck afterwards. If you returned five cards, choose up to two cards in your clock, and put them into your waiting room. Put this card into your memory.
flavor_text: Let's Eat♪

name: Dark Hero
ability: COUNTER@ You may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. Choose one of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】."
flavor_text: Luckily for the contestants, I, the Dark Hero, am the MC and referee. Otherwise, I would be winning this competition!!

name: Newlywed Queen
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavor_text: Upon returning to the human world, we were surprised to find -----

name: Final Weapon Appears
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavor_text: Heh heh heh…… Which one of you fools reopened this basin in Hades……

name: Overlord Summon
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavor_text: Mom: "By the spirits of darkness and light... In the name of Adell, I hereby summon "Overlord Zenon" to his side!"

name: Overlord Almaz
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +3 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Overlord!?
Meeeeeee!?

name: Prinny Squad
ability: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck.
【ACT】 [Put a 《Prinny》 character into your waiting room] Choose one of your opponent's characters in the center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: If you give up, the game is over, Dood!

name: The Weakest Protaganist in History, Prinny
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Prinny》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: All-purposed peons…? We are the protagonist, Dood!

name: Disgaea D2
ability: Choose two of your characters, and 【REST】 them. If you 【REST】 two characters, deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the total level of the those characters. (This damage may be canceled)

name: Laharl & Flonne
flavor_text: Laharl: "That's right! I'm the Overlord!"

name: Prinny Squad
ability: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck.
【ACT】 [Put a 《Prinny》 character into your waiting room] Choose one of your opponent's characters in the center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Etna: "Come on, Prinny Squad!!"
Etna: "Get your butts out here, NOW!!"

name: Fallen Angel of Love. Flonne
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When a card named "Netherworld Wrapped in Love" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "“Pinch Revival” Pure Flonne" in your waiting room, and put it on this card's previous stage position.
flavor_text: Isn't that nice? I can't help but smile when I see siblings getting along so well!

name: “Pinch Revival” Pure Flonne
ability: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +1500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your waiting room, you may choose an 《Angel》 character in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: Pure Flonne's angel skill, "Love Negotiation" should be able to persuade them!

name: Raspberyl & Sapphire All Ready for Gym
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of climax in your waiting room is four or more, this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".
flavor_text:
Are there really demons that are this cute?
That's too much for me!

name: Netherworld Wrapped in Love
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: That's the power of love!!

name: Overlord's Vassal, Etna
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Overlord Zenon Defeated!!" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Prinny》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

【ACT】 [(1)] Choose one of your 《Prinny》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is lower than or equal to the level of this card, you may 【REVERSE】 that character."
flavor_text: Your humble vassal, Etna, will accompany you.

name: Aesthetics of Evil, Valvatorez
ability: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose one of your 《Demon》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: How many times do I have to tell you!? A proud demon like myself would never break a promise!!

name: Son of the Previous Overlord, Laharl
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack."
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in you hand, and put it into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 [(1)] During your turn, when another of your characters becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card is on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 that character.
flavor_text: I won't lose to this guy.

name: Etna, the Overlord Assassin
flavor_text: ……Wow. He's really dead, huh?

name: “Angel of Avarice” Vulcanus (?)
flavor_text: A demonic social reformer? Hmhm, Mr. Weirdo.

name: Reborn Krichevskoy
ability: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Garungun: "He is the newest and evilest Overlord in New Netherworld history, New King Krichevskoy!"

name: Girl Laharl
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card named "Eternal Idol" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Idol Overlord, Girl Laharl" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as 【REST】.
flavor_text: Hmhmhm…… Remember me!?

name: President Overlord Laharl
flavor_text:
There's only one main character in this world, and that's me!
President Overlord Laharl!!

name: Proud Demon, Valvatorez
ability: 【ACT】 COUNTER@ Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Don't worry about that. You can count on me.

name: Idol Overlord, Girl Laharl
flavor_text: I don't care if she is an idol， I can't allow her to be famous without my permission!

name: Mecha-Jennifer
ability: Deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax in your waiting room. (This damage may be canceled)
flavor_text:
"So that did the trick?"
"Is it better now?"
"Well, it sure feels like it."

name: Ties of "Camaraderie"
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: ───Listen up, God!! It is the demons who must punish the humansfor their sins! Your turn ends here!!

name: Eternal Idol
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: "And so that's how Laharl become the Netherworld's next top idol."

name: Overlord Zenon Defeated!!
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: Usagi: "Overlord Zenon has been defeated today."
